name: OGTT_LOINC
title: OGTT_LOINC
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for OGTT - Oral glucose tolerance tests.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute OGTT for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: OGTT for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: OGTT Codes that constitute the Clinical Grouping Event for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
